title: Complex cell-state changes revealed by single cell RNA sequencing of 76,149 microglia throughout the mouse lifespan and in the injured brain
abstract: Single cell RNA sequencing of FACS purified mouse microglia from embryogenesis to old age, and following injury using a demyelinating mouse model.
overall_design: 41 total animals, 3-4 replicates per timepoint and condition. E14.5, P4/P5, P30, P100, P540, and Injury
summary: Single cell RNA sequencing of FACS purified mouse microglia from embryogenesis to old age, and following injury using a demyelinating mouse model.
